parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the peripheral configuration structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_SAADC_Type *p_reg, uint32_t mask, uint8_t irq_priority, bool enable)
memberdef.name: nrfy_saadc_int_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified SAADC interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be initialized.
Interrupt priority.
True if the interrupts are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the SAADC interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for processing the specified SAADC events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of events to be processed, created by NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().
Pointer to the structure containing buffer associated with the last sampling. Can be NULL.

simplesect.para: Mask of events that were generated and processed. To be checked against the result of NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

briefdescription.para: Function for configuring the specified SAADC channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channel number.
Pointer to the channel configuration structure. NULL if configuration is to be omitted.
Pointer to the channel input configuration structure. NULL if configuration is to be omitted.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the SAADC sampling buffer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

True if buffer is to be latched, false otherwise.
True if latching is to be blocking, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for latching the SAADC sampling buffer.

True if latching is to be blocking, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for starting the SAADC sampling.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing sampling buffer if the sampling is to be blocking. NULL for non-blocking operation.

briefdescription.para: Function for aborting the ongoing SAADC sampling.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the structure containing sampling buffer if the abort is to be blocking. NULL for non-blocking operation.
Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if stopping is to be blocking, false otherwise.
Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if calibration is to be blocking, false otherwise.

nrf_saadc_busy_check Function for checking whether the SAADC is busy.

detaileddescription.para: This function checks whether the analog-to-digital converter is busy with a conversion.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The SAADC is busy.
The SAADC is not busy.

simplesect.para: nrf_saadc_enable Function for enabling the SAADC.

detaileddescription.para: The analog-to-digital converter must be enabled before use.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_saadc_disable Function for disabling the SAADC.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_saadc_enable_check Function for checking if the SAADC is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The SAADC is enabled.
The SAADC is not enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the result buffer.
Size of the buffer (in 8-bit or 16-bit samples).

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the result buffer.

simplesect.para: nrf_saadc_buffer_pointer_get Function for getting the SAADC result buffer pointer.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Pointer to the result buffer.
nrf_saadc_amount_get Function for getting the number of samples written to the result buffer since the previous START task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Number of 8-bit or 16-bit samples written to the buffer.
nrf_saadc_resolution_set Function for setting the SAADC sample resolution.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Bit resolution.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

nrf_saadc_oversample_set Function for configuring the oversampling feature.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Oversampling mode.

simplesect.para: nrf_saadc_oversample_get Function for getting the oversampling feature configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Oversampling configuration.
nrf_saadc_oversample_sample_count_get Function for getting the sample count needed for one averaged result for a given oversampling configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Oversampling configuration.

simplesect.para: Sample count.
nrf_saadc_continuous_mode_enable Function for enabling the continuous sampling.

detaileddescription.para: This function configures the SAADC internal timer to automatically take new samples at a fixed sample rate. Trigger the START task to begin continuous sampling. To stop the sampling, trigger the STOP task.

simplesect.para: The internal timer can only be used when a single input channel is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Capture and compare value. Sample rate is 16 MHz/cc. Valid CC range is from 80 to 2047.

simplesect.para: nrf_saadc_continuous_mode_enable_check Function for checking if the continuous sampling is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The continuous sampling is enabled.
The continuous sampling is disabled.

simplesect.para: nrf_saadc_continuous_mode_disable Function for disabling the continuous sampling.

detaileddescription.para: New samples can still be acquired by manually triggering the SAMPLE task or by PPI.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_saadc_channel_init Function for initializing the SAADC channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channel number.
Pointer to the channel configuration structure.

simplesect.para: nrf_saadc_burst_set Function for configuring the burst mode for the specified channel.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Channel number.
Burst mode setting.

simplesect.para: nrf_saadc_value_min_get Function for getting the minimum value of the conversion result.

detaileddescription.para: The minimum value of the conversion result depends on the configured resolution.

parameterdescription.para: Bit resolution.

simplesect.para: Minimum value of the conversion result.
nrf_saadc_value_max_get Function for getting the maximum value of the conversion result.

detaileddescription.para: The maximum value of the conversion result depends on the configured resolution.

parameterdescription.para: Bit resolution.

simplesect.para: Maximum value of the conversion result.

briefdescription.para: Hardware access layer with cache and barrier support for managing the SAADC peripheral.
